document.full_text: gary gensler, the c.f.t.c.'s chairman, and mary l. schapiro, the s.e.c.'s chairwoman, say they need hundreds of millions of dollars to prevent another financial crisis.
document.title: on capitol hill, regulators plead for more money
lines_and_colors: gary gensler, the c.f.t.c.'s chairman, and mary l. schapiro, the s.e.c.'s chairwoman, say they need hundreds of millions of dollars to prevent another financial crisis.
